description:
The Death General Olegmon`s crew has turned Ballistamon into the ultimate destructive weapon, DarkVolumon! Olegmon uses him to attack and capture Taiki, whom he again invites to join his army. But when Taiki refuses, Olegmon orders DarkVolumon to attack Nene! Kiriha and Shoutmon soon arrive to save them, and Shoutmon attempts to restore DarkVolumon to his old self by calling out to Ballistamon through a DigiXros. Will his voice reach Ballistamon?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kinzoku no Olegmon ga Warau! Saraba Xros Heart!
Olegmon the Golden Thief Laughs! Farewell Xros Heart!
金賊(きんぞく)のオレーグモンが笑う! さらばクロスハート!
